Subject: HP:0030271
Value: 2,3-diphosphoglycerate (2,3-DPG) controls the movement of oxygen from red blood cells to tissues. Anemia is usually accompanied by an increased level of 2,3-DPG in order to promote tissue oxygenation. This term refers to an inappropriate low 2,3-DPG concentration in erythrocytes.

Subject: HP:0040230
Value: tPA catalyzes the conversion of plasiminogen to plasmin, and thus break down of clots. When there is a deficiency there will be an increase of thrombosis
